contents:
The developmen of CoFI is now being supported through an AuScope 2021 Pilot Project.
More information can be found on the AuScope website
Begin exploring the development version of CoFI by heading to Colab
title: CoFI

contents:
Using polynomial regression as an example we explore how CoFI allows us to swap between fundamentally different inference and optimisation approaches without the need to redefine the problem.
Background CoFI Problem definition Trying different inverse problem solvers Conclusions
title: Tearing down barriers...

contents:
The American Geophysical Union has awarded the 2020 Gutenberg Lecture to Prof. Malcolm Sambridge.
The Beno Gutenberg Lecture is presented annually in recognition of outstanding contributions to the field of seismology. The lecture is named to honor the life and work of renowned seismologist Beno Gutenberg and is presented during the AGU Fall Meeting.
More information can be found on the AGU website here
A biased tour of geophysics Slide deck Download the slides in pdf format
title: 2020 Gutenberg Lecture
